title: Every site to have access free of encroachment: Every site proposed to be developed or redeveloped shall have access from a public street/road as required in these Regulations
clause_text: Every site to have access free of encroachment: Every site proposed to be developed or redeveloped shall have access from a public street/road as required in these Regulations. Such access shall be kept free of encroachment.
section: Public Street and Means of Access
